verses.verse: וּבֹ֨עַז <S%H1162><s%> u-Vo-'az Boaz עָלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lah up הַשַּׁעַר֮ <S%H8179><s%> hash-sha-'Ar to the gate וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev and sat him down שָׁם֒ <S%H8033><s%> sham there וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold הַגֹּאֵ֤ל <S%H1350><s%> hag-go-'El there and behold the kinsman עֹבֵר֙ <S%H5674><s%> 'o-Ver came אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher of whom דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> dib-ber- spake בֹּ֔עַז <S%H1162><s%> Bo-'az, of whom Boaz וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer by unto whom he said ס֥וּרָה <S%H5493><s%> Su-rah turn aside שְׁבָה־ <S%H3427><s%> she-vah- sit down פֹּ֖ה <S%H6311><s%> poh here פְּלֹנִ֣י <S%H6423><s%> pe-lo-Ni such אַלְמֹנִ֑י <S%H492><s%> 'al-mo-Ni; a one וַיָּ֖סַר <S%H5493><s%> vai-Ya-sar here And he turned aside וַיֵּשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> vai-ye-Shev. and sat down

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach And he took עֲשָׂרָ֧ה <S%H6235><s%> 'a-sa-Rah ten אֲנָשִׁ֛ים <S%H582><s%> 'a-na-Shim men מִזִּקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> miz-zik-Nei of the elders הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir of the city וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said שְׁבוּ־ <S%H3427><s%> she-vu- Sit ye down פֹ֑ה <S%H6311><s%> Foh; here וַיֵּשֵֽׁבוּ׃ <S%H3427><s%> vai-ye-She-vu. here And they sat down

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said לַגֹּאֵ֔ל <S%H1350><s%> lag-go-'El, unto the kinsman חֶלְקַת֙ <S%H2513><s%> chel-Kat a parcel הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh, out of the country אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לְאָחִ֖ינוּ <S%H251><s%> le-'a-Chi-nu which [was] our brother לֶאֱלִימֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H458><s%> le-'e-li-Me-lech; Elimelech's מָכְרָ֣ה <S%H4376><s%> ma-che-Rah selleth נָעֳמִ֔י <S%H5281><s%> no-'o-Mi, Naomi הַשָּׁ֖בָה <S%H7725><s%> hash-Sha-vah that is come again מִשְּׂדֵ֥ה <S%H7704><s%> mis-se-Deh of land מוֹאָֽב׃ <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av. of Moab

וַאֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I אָמַ֜רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ti And I thought אֶגְלֶ֧ה <S%H1540><s%> 'eg-Leh advertise אָזְנְךָ֣ <S%H241><s%> 'a-ze-ne-Cha you לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, thee saying קְ֠נֵה <S%H7069><s%> Ke-neh Buy נֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> Ne-ged before הַֽיֹּשְׁבִים֮ <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-she-Vim [it] before the inhabitants וְנֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> ve-Ne-ged and before זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei and before the elders עַמִּי֒ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi of my people אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If תִּגְאַל֙ <S%H1350><s%> tig-'Al If thou wilt redeem גְּאָ֔ל <S%H1350><s%> ge-'Al, [it] redeem וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יִגְאַ֜ל <S%H1350><s%> yig-'Al [it] but if thou wilt not redeem הַגִּ֣ידָה <S%H5046><s%> hag-Gi-dah [it then] tell לִּ֗י Li, ; וְאֵדַע ve-'e-da' כוְאֵֽדְעָה֙ <S%H3045><s%> ve-'e-de-'Ah acknowledge קכִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein there זוּלָֽתְךָ֙ <S%H2108><s%> zu-la-te-Cha [it] beside לִגְא֔וֹל <S%H1350><s%> lig-'ol, for [there is] none to redeem וְאָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> ve-'a-no-Chi I אַחֲרֶ֑יךָ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei-cha; thee and I [am] after וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer thee And he said אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I אֶגְאָֽל׃ <S%H1350><s%> 'eg-'Al. I will redeem

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said בֹּ֔עַז <S%H1162><s%> Bo-'az, Boaz בְּיוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> be-yom- What day קְנוֹתְךָ֥ <S%H7069><s%> ke-not-Cha thou buyest הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh the field מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad of the hand נָעֳמִ֑י <S%H5281><s%> no-'o-Mi; of Naomi וּ֠מֵאֵת <S%H854><s%> U-me-'et for ר֣וּת <S%H7327><s%> rut [it] also of Ruth הַמּוֹאֲבִיָּ֤ה <S%H4125><s%> ham-mo-'a-vi-Yah the Moabitess אֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> 'e-shet- the wife הַמֵּת֙ <S%H4191><s%> ham-Met of the dead; קָנִיתִי ka-ni-ti כקָנִ֔יתָה <S%H7069><s%> ka-Ni-tah, buy קלְהָקִ֥ים <S%H6965><s%> le-ha-Kim to raise up שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> shem- the name הַמֵּ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> ham-Met of the dead עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-To. upon his inheritance

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said הַגֹּאֵ֗ל <S%H1350><s%> hag-go-'El, And the kinsman לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo not אוּכַל֙ <S%H3201><s%> 'u-Chal I cannot; לִגְאֹול־ lig-'ol- כלִגְאָל־ <S%H1350><s%> lig-'ol- RedeemLi, ק <S%H1350><s%> redeem פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- because אַשְׁחִ֖ית <S%H7843><s%> 'ash-Chit [it] for myself lest I mar אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַחֲלָתִ֑י <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Ti; mine own inheritance גְּאַל־ <S%H1350><s%> ge-'al- redeem לְךָ֤ le-Cha אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- גְּאֻלָּתִ֔י <S%H1353><s%> ge-'ul-la-Ti, thou my right כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not אוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> 'u-Chal to thyself for I cannot לִגְאֹֽל׃ <S%H1350><s%> lig-'Ol. redeem

וְזֹאת֩ <S%H2063><s%> ve-zoT in לְפָנִ֨ים <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nim Now this [was the manner] in former time בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El in Israel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning הַגְּאוּלָּ֤ה <S%H1353><s%> hag-ge-'ul-Lah concerning redeeming וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- concerning הַתְּמוּרָה֙ <S%H8545><s%> hat-te-mu-Rah and concerning changing לְקַיֵּ֣ם <S%H6965><s%> le-kai-Yem for to confirm כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var, all things שָׁלַ֥ף <S%H8025><s%> sha-Laf plucked off אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish a man נַעֲל֖וֹ <S%H5275><s%> na-'a-Lo his shoe וְנָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tan and gave לְרֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> le-re-'E-hu; [it] to his neighbour וְזֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> ve-Zot was the הַתְּעוּדָ֖ה <S%H8584><s%> hat-te-'u-Dah and this [was] a testimony בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El. in Israel

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said הַגֹּאֵ֛ל <S%H1350><s%> hag-go-'El Therefore the kinsman לְבֹ֖עַז <S%H1162><s%> le-Vo-'az unto Boaz קְנֵה־ <S%H7069><s%> ke-neh- Buy לָ֑ךְ Lach; וַיִּשְׁלֹ֖ף <S%H8025><s%> vai-yish-Lof [it] for thee So he drew off נַעֲלֽוֹ׃ <S%H5275><s%> na-'a-Lo. his shoe

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mer said בֹּ֨עַז <S%H1162><s%> Bo-'az And Boaz לַזְּקֵנִ֜ים <S%H2205><s%> laz-ze-ke-Nim unto the elders וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, and [unto] all the people עֵדִ֤ים <S%H5707><s%> 'e-Dim Ye [are] witnesses אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, this day כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for קָנִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7069><s%> ka-Ni-ti that I have bought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that לֶֽאֱלִימֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H458><s%> le-'e-li-Me-lech, all that [was] Elimelech's וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that לְכִלְי֖וֹן <S%H3630><s%> le-chil-Yon and all that [was] Chilion's וּמַחְל֑וֹן <S%H4248><s%> u-mach-Lon; and Mahlon's מִיַּ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad of the hand נָעֳמִֽי׃ <S%H5281><s%> no-'o-Mi. of Naomi

וְגַ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam Moreover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ר֣וּת <S%H7327><s%> rut Moreover Ruth הַמֹּאֲבִיָּה֩ <S%H4125><s%> ham-mo-'a-vi-Yah the Moabitess אֵ֨שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet the wife מַחְל֜וֹן <S%H4248><s%> mach-Lon of Mahlon קָנִ֧יתִי <S%H7069><s%> ka-Ni-ti have I purchased לִ֣י li לְאִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah, to be my wife לְהָקִ֤ים <S%H6965><s%> le-ha-Kim to raise up שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> shem- the name הַמֵּת֙ <S%H4191><s%> ham-Met of the dead עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on נַ֣חֲלָת֔וֹ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-To, upon his inheritance וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not יִכָּרֵ֧ת <S%H3772><s%> yik-ka-Ret be not cut off שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> shem- that the name הַמֵּ֛ת <S%H4191><s%> ham-Met of the dead מֵעִ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> me-'Im from among אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav his brethren וּמִשַּׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> u-mish-Sha-'ar and from the gate מְקוֹמ֑וֹ <S%H4725><s%> me-ko-Mo; of his place עֵדִ֥ים <S%H5707><s%> 'e-Dim ye [are] witnesses אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom. this day

וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru said כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All הָעָ֧ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who בַּשַּׁ֛עַר <S%H8179><s%> bash-Sha-'ar that [were] in the gate וְהַזְּקֵנִ֖ים <S%H2205><s%> ve-haz-ze-ke-Nim and the elders עֵדִ֑ים <S%H5707><s%> 'e-Dim; [We are] witnesses יִתֵּן֩ <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten make יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאִשָּׁ֜ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah the woman הַבָּאָ֣ה <S%H935><s%> hab-ba-'Ah that is come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into בֵּיתֶ֗ךָ <S%H1004><s%> bei-Te-cha, into thine house כְּרָחֵ֤ל׀ <S%H7354><s%> ke-ra-Chel like Rachel וּכְלֵאָה֙ <S%H3812><s%> u-che-le-'Ah and like Leah אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher of whom בָּנ֤וּ <S%H1129><s%> ba-Nu did build שְׁתֵּיהֶם֙ <S%H8147><s%> she-tei-Hem which two אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וַעֲשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> va-'a-seh- and do חַ֣יִל <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil thou worthily בְּאֶפְרָ֔תָה <S%H672><s%> be-'ef-Ra-tah, in Ephratah וּקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> u-ke-ra- and become שֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> shem base בְּבֵ֥ית be-Veit לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H1035><s%> La-chem. in Bethlehem

וִיהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> vi-Hi become בֵֽיתְךָ֙ <S%H1004><s%> vei-te-Cha And let thy house כְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> ke-Veit be like the house פֶּ֔רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> Pe-retz, of Pharez אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom יָלְדָ֥ה <S%H3205><s%> Yal-dah bare תָמָ֖ר <S%H8559><s%> ta-Mar whom Tamar לִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> li-hu-Dah; unto Judah מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- through הַזֶּ֗רַע <S%H2233><s%> haz-Ze-ra', of the seed אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יִתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten shall give יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD לְךָ֔ le-Cha, מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- through הַֽנַּעֲרָ֖ה <S%H5291><s%> han-na-'a-Rah thee of this young woman הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot. likewise

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took בֹּ֤עַז <S%H1162><s%> Bo-'az So Boaz אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רוּת֙ <S%H7327><s%> rut Ruth וַתְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vat-te-hi- became ל֣וֹ lo לְאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah, and she was his wife וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo and when he went in אֵלֶ֑יהָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha; about וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten gave יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto her the LORD לָ֛הּ lah הֵרָי֖וֹן <S%H2032><s%> he-ra-Yon her conception וַתֵּ֥לֶד <S%H3205><s%> vat-Te-led and she bare בֵּֽן׃ <S%H1121><s%> Ben. a son

וַתֹּאמַ֤רְנָה <S%H559><s%> vat-to-Mar-nah said הַנָּשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> han-na-Shim And the women אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to נָעֳמִ֔י <S%H5281><s%> no-'o-Mi, unto Naomi בָּר֣וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> ba-Ruch Blessed יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, [be] the LORD אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo has not הִשְׁבִּ֥ית <S%H7673><s%> hish-Bit which hath not left לָ֛ךְ lach גֹּאֵ֖ל <S%H1350><s%> go-'El without a kinsman הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom; thee this day וְיִקָּרֵ֥א <S%H7121><s%> ve-yik-ka-Re may be famous שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo that his name בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El. in Israel

וְהָ֤יָה <S%H1961><s%> ve-Ha-yah become לָךְ֙ loCh לְמֵשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> le-me-Shiv And he shall be unto thee a restorer נֶ֔פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh, of [thy] life וּלְכַלְכֵּ֖ל <S%H3557><s%> u-le-chal-Kel and a nourisher אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֵׂיבָתֵ֑ךְ <S%H7872><s%> sei-va-Tech; of thine old age כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for כַלָּתֵ֤ךְ <S%H3618><s%> chal-la-Tech for thy daughter in law אֲ‍ ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'asher- who אֲהֵבַ֙תֶךְ֙ <S%H157><s%> 'a-he-Va-tech which loveth יְלָדַ֔תּוּ <S%H3205><s%> ye-la-Dat-tu, hath born אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> hi and is ט֣וֹבָה <S%H2896><s%> Toah thee which is better לָ֔ךְ Lach, מִשִּׁבְעָ֖ה <S%H7651><s%> mish-shiv-'Ah to thee than seven בָּנִֽים׃ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim. sons
